mapper.insert:
select imageNo.nextval from dual
insert into gallery(imageNo,imageTitle,userId,uploadImg,imageContents) values (#{imageNo},#{imageTitle},#{userId},#{uploadImg},#{imageContents})
mapper.select: select * from gallery order by imageNo desc
mapper.update: update gallery set imageTitle = #{imageTitle}, userId = #{userId}, uploadImg = #{uploadImg}, imageContents = #{imageContents} where imageNo = #{imageNo}
